rulings.text: An ability that triggers when a player casts a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Blisterspit Gremlin's first ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.
Players can cast spells and activate abilities after the triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does.

mainBoard.name: Chandra's Pyreling
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: Combat damage is the damage that's dealt automatically by attacking and blocking creatures. Any other damage is noncombat damage, even if it's dealt during a combat phase by an attacking or blocking creature.

The ability of Chandra's Pyreling triggers just once per event for each opponent who is dealt noncombat damage by a source you control, regardless of how much damage that player is dealt. For example, if a sorcery you control deals 2 damage to each opponent in a four-player game, the ability will trigger three times.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Researcher
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Researcher enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with Goblin Researcher, you may play that card.

rulings.text: Casting an exiled card causes it to leave exile. You can't cast it multiple times.
Goblin Researcher's effect doesn't change when you can play the exiled card. For example, if you exile a sorcery card, you can cast it only during your main phase when the stack is empty.
If you control more than one card named Goblin Researcher, each one's effect is independent from the other. Specifically, attacking with one will not allow you to play the card exiled by the other.

If you exile a land card with Goblin Researcher's enters-the-battlefield ability, you may play that land only if you have any available land plays. Normally, this means you can play the land only if you haven't played a land yet that turn.
The card Goblin Researcher exiles is exiled face up.
You can play the exiled card if Goblin Researcher attacked and is still in combat, has left combat, has left the battlefield, or even if combat is over.

mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with this creature, you may play that card.

mainBoard.name: Magmatic Channeler
mainBoard.originalText:
As long as there are four or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Magmatic Channeler gets +3/+1.
{T}, Discard a card: Exile the top two cards of your library, then choose one of them. You may play that card this turn.

rulings.text: If you don’t play the exiled card you chose, it remains exiled. The card you didn’t choose remains exiled whether you play the chosen card or not.
Magmatic Channeler gets just +3/+1 from its first ability, no matter how many instant and sorcery cards are in your graveyard beyond the fourth.

You choose which card you’ll be allowed to play this turn while Magmatic Channeler’s ability is resolving, but you must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the card when you play it. If it’s a land, you can’t play it unless you have land plays available.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.

mainBoard.name: Wildfire Elemental
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Combat damage is the damage that's dealt automatically by attacking and blocking creatures. Any other damage is noncombat damage, even if it's dealt during a combat phase by an attacking or blocking creature.
In a multiplayer game, if a source deals damage to multiple opponents at the same time, the last ability of Wildfire Elemental will trigger that many times.
The last ability of Wildfire Elemental triggers once for each event in which an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, regardless of how much damage that player is dealt.
Wildfire Elemental's triggered ability affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures you begin to control later in the turn won't get +1/+0.

foreignData.name: 苦悩火
foreignData.text:
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。苦悩火はそれにＸ点のダメージを与える。
Ｘが５以上であるなら、この呪文は打ち消されず、これのダメージは軽減できない。

foreignData.flavorText: Para Sarkhan Vol, el dragón es la expresión más pura del esplendor de la vida salvaje.
foreignData.name: Fuego devastador
foreignData.text:
El Fuego devastador hace X puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.
Si X es 5 o más, este hechizo no puede ser contrarrestado y el daño no puede ser prevenido.

mainBoard.name: Banefire
mainBoard.originalText:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

rulings.text: Banefire can be targeted by spells that try to counter it regardless of what the value of X is. If X is 5 or more, those spells will still resolve, but the part of their effect that would counter Banefire won’t do anything. Any other effects those spells have will work as normal.
If its target is illegal by the time Banefire tries to resolve, the spell isn’t countered, but it doesn’t resolve. The target won’t be dealt damage.

To determine whether it can be countered and its damage can be prevented, Banefire checks the number you chose for X, not the amount of mana you actually spent or the amount of damage it will actually deal.

mainBoard.text:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreignData.flavorText:
「你走好运啦。我带来的够大家享用。」
～茜卓纳拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰对任意一个，两个或三个目标造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。

foreignData.flavorText:
« Vous avez de la chance. Je suis partageuse. »
—Chandra Nalaàr
foreignData.name: Flammes du brandon
foreignData.text: Les Flammes du brandon infligent 3 blessures réparties comme vous le désirez entre une, deux ou trois cibles.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Du hast Glück. Ich kann ein paar abgeben."
—Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Flammen des Hitzkopfs
foreignData.text: Die Flammen des Hitzkopfs fügen 3 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf ein, zwei oder drei Ziele deiner Wahl du bestimmst.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sei fortunato. Ne ho portato abbastanza da condividere."
—Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente
foreignData.text: Le Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente infliggono 3 danni divisi a tua scelta tra uno, due o tre bersagli.

foreignData.flavorText:
「あんたは幸せよ。私のものを分けてあげる。」
――チャンドラ・ナラー
foreignData.name: 炬火の炎
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つか２つか３つを対象とし、３点分をあなたの望むように割り振る。炬火の炎はそれらにその割り振った点数のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Tienes suerte. Traigo suficiente como para compartir".
—Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Llamas de la instigadora
foreignData.text: Las Llamas de la instigadora hacen 3 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre uno, dos o tres objetivos.

mainBoard.name: Flames of the Firebrand
mainBoard.originalText: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

rulings.text: You divide the damage as you cast Flames of the Firebrand, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage. (In other words, as you put the spell on the stack, you choose whether to have it deal 3 damage to a single target, 2 damage to one target and 1 damage to another target, or 1 damage to each of three targets.)

mainBoard.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

mainBoard.flavorText: May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion.

foreignData.flavorText: 「愿善人在受福安眠中得享永恒。愿恶人在湮没遗忘中获得安息。」
foreignData.name: 火焰柱
foreignData.text: 火焰柱对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。如果本回合中曾以此法受到伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

foreignData.flavorText: « Puissent les justes passer l'éternité dans le Sommeil béni. Puissent les âmes corrompues trouver la paix dans l'anéantissement. »
foreignData.name: Pilier de flammes
foreignData.text: Le Pilier de flammes inflige 2 blessures à n'importe quelle cible. Si une créature ayant subi des blessures de cette manière devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: „Mögen die Würdigen eine Ewigkeit im Heiligen Schlaf verbringen. Mögen die Bösen Frieden in der Vernichtung finden."
foreignData.name: Flammensäule
foreignData.text: Die Flammensäule fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls eine Kreatur, der auf diese Weise Schaden zugefügt wurde, in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: "Possano i valorosi riposare in eterno nel Sonno Benedetto. Possano i malvagi conoscere la pace dell'oblio."
foreignData.name: Pilastro di Fiamme
foreignData.text: Il Pilastro di Fiamme infligge 2 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio. Se una creatura a cui è stato inflitto danno in questo modo sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: 「価値ある者が祝福された眠りのうちに永遠を過ごさんことを。邪な者が忘却という平和を見出さんことを。」
foreignData.name: 火柱
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。火柱はそれに２点のダメージを与える。このターン、これによりダメージを受けたクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: "Que los dignos pasen la eternidad en el Sueño Bendito. Que los malvados encuentren la paz del olvido".
foreignData.name: Pilar de llamas
foreignData.text: El Pilar de llamas hace 2 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo. Si una criatura que recibió daño de esta manera fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.

mainBoard.name: Pillar of Flame
mainBoard.originalText: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: A creature dealt damage by Pillar of Flame that dies this turn will be exiled even if it wasn’t the target of Pillar of Flame (because the damage was redirected somehow). If the target creature isn’t dealt damage (most likely because the damage was prevented), it won’t be exiled if it dies that turn.
A creature dealt damage by Pillar of Flame will be exiled no matter why the creature would die that turn. It could have its toughness reduced to 0 or less or be destroyed by another spell or ability.

mainBoard.text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: Burning something is easy. Choosing a target can be more difficult.

foreignData.flavorText: 烧东西不难；烧得准才难。
foreignData.name: 火热干预
foreignData.text:
选择一项～
•火热干预对目标生物造成5点伤害。
•消灭目标神器。

foreignData.flavorText: Brûler quelque chose n'est pas difficile. Choisir une cible l'est beaucoup plus.
foreignData.name: Intervention ardente
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• L'Intervention ardente inflige 5 blessures à une créature ciblée.
• Détruisez un artefact ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Etwas zu verbrennen, ist ganz einfach. Das richtige Ziel zu treffen, ist da schon schwerer.
foreignData.name: Feurige Intervention
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Die Feurige Intervention fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu.
• Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Bruciare qualcosa è facile. Scegliere un bersaglio può essere molto più difficile.
foreignData.name: Intervento Fiammante
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• L'Intervento Fiammante infligge 5 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
• Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 燃やすこと自体は簡単だ。対象を選ぶことの方が難しい場合もある。
foreignData.name: 焦熱の介入
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。焦熱の介入はそれに５点のダメージを与える。
・アーティファクト１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Quemar algo es fácil, lo difícil es elegir el objetivo.
foreignData.name: Intervención ardorosa
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
• La Intervención ardorosa hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
• Destruye el artefacto objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Fiery Intervention
mainBoard.originalText:
Choose one —
• Fiery Intervention deals 5 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Fiery Intervention deals 5 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Reality is always much duller and grayer than what your imagination can conjure."

foreignData.flavorText: 「现实永远比你想象的要阴晦黑暗得多。」
foreignData.name: 快意拼搏
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: « La réalité est toujours bien plus terne et bien plus maussade que ce que l'imagination peut conjurer. »
foreignData.name: Frisson de probabilité
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Realität ist immer viel trüber und grauer als das, was man sich vorstellen kann."
foreignData.name: Verlockung der Möglichkeiten
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "La realtà è sempre molto più grigia e noiosa di quel che può creare l'immaginazione."
foreignData.name: Brivido della Possibilità
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「現実は想像の産物よりよっぽど地味でつまんないね。」
foreignData.name: 胸躍る可能性
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード１枚を捨てる。
カード２枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "La realidad siempre es mucho más aburrida y gris que lo que puede suceder en tu imaginación".
foreignData.name: Entusiasmo ante la posibilidad
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta una carta.
Roba dos cartas.

mainBoard.name: Thrill of Possibility
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must discard exactly one card to cast Thrill of Possibility; you can't cast it without discarding a card, and you can't discard additional cards.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: 无数世代过去，石头磨损，显露出高山核心处的丰富颜色。
foreignData.name: 兴旺绝壁
foreignData.text:
兴旺绝壁须横置进战场。
于兴旺绝壁进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Felsklippe ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する絶壁が戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R} か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Risco floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
